member.name: MFNominalRange
member.summary: Specifies whether color data includes headroom and toeroom. Headroom allows for values beyond 1.0 white ("whiter than white"), and toeroom allows for values below reference 0.0 black ("blacker than black").

member.name: MFNominalRange.MFNominalRange_0_255
member.summary: The normalized range [0...1] maps to [0...255] for 8-bit samples or [0...1023] for 10-bit samples.

member.name: MFNominalRange.MFNominalRange_16_235
member.summary: The normalized range [0...1] maps to [16...235] for 8-bit samples or [64...940] for 10-bit samples.

member.name: MFNominalRange.MFNominalRange_48_208
member.summary: The normalized range [0..1] maps to [48...208] for 8-bit samples or [64...940] for 10-bit samples.

summary.para: The normalized range [0..1] maps to [64...127] for 8-bit samples or [256...508] for 10-bit samples. This range is used in the xRGB color space.
